  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: LOOSE CAPS LEAKING DURING TRANSIT INSIDE SOILED OPENED BOX, UNLOADED, PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND A RED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS LEAKING FLAMMABLE LIQUID DURING TRANSIT SOILING THE OPENED WET SOILED BOX SOILING ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND A RED HAZMAT TOTE.
